title: If you could rebuild the Earth from scratch, what would your new Earth be like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Two changes: Give about half of humanity Bonobo-like behavior rather than Chimp-like behavior. Make love not war.Swap proto-Venus and proto-Mars, improving the climates of both. Also, give at least one of them at least two moons large enough to be visible with the naked eye. This would help humans figure out astronomy sooner.

The planet would be physically the same except the oceans, air and ground would have no pollution. The human race would be better off by understanding reality through science. Rather than through myths, fables, religions that muddle progress.
